name: MindSet screenflow - Pablo Balbo
description:
This is a screenflow for a company that provides Human Resources services to different companies. The objective was to develop the screenflow necessary to design the main window, the windows corresponding to the user registration and their correct visualization of profile information, a login, the possibility of requesting appointments online and organizing the work of psychologists, who also They will be able to create and use a user specially designed for them.

The project was made with Figma v93.4.0, under the instructions of the Radium Rocket Software Developer course.
